sentences.en: Details of the program are a closely-guarded secret .
sentences.cn: 该项目的细节是严格保密的。

sentences.en: He closely guarded her identity.
sentences.cn: 他对她的身份守口如瓶。

sentences.en: He had worked closely with the President during his governorship.
sentences.cn: 他在任州长期间与总统紧密合作。

sentences.en: He held her closely, burying his head against her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他紧紧地抱住她，把头靠在她的肩上。

sentences.en: Human rights groups have been closely watching the case.
sentences.cn: 人权组织一直在密切关注此案。

sentences.en: lightning, followed closely by thunder
sentences.cn: 闪电，紧跟着是雷鸣

sentences.en: My social life and business life are closely tied.
sentences.cn: 我的社交生活和工作联系紧密。

sentences.en: She looked at him closely to see if his evasiveness was intentional.
sentences.cn: 她端详着他，想要知道他是否故意回避。

sentences.en: Tenants should check their tenancy agreements closely.
sentences.cn: 租户应该认真核对租赁合同。

sentences.en: The detective watched him closely , waiting for a reply.
sentences.cn: 侦探紧盯着他看，等着他回答。

sentences.en: The detention raised two distinct but closely linked questions.
sentences.cn: 这一拘留行为引发了两个互为独立但又密切相关的问题。

sentences.en: The letter consists of six closely typed pages.
sentences.cn: 那封信有密密麻麻打印出来的6页。

sentences.en: The philosophical problems of chance and of free will are closely related.
sentences.cn: 或然性和自由意志这两个哲学问题是紧密相关的。

sentences.en: The political opinions of spouses correlate more closely than their heights.
sentences.cn: 配偶之间政治观点上的相似度要大于他们身高的相似程度。

sentences.en: The successful applicant will be working closely with our international staff.
sentences.cn: 被录用者将与我们的国际员工紧密合作。

sentences.en: They crowded more closely around the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 他们在担架旁围得更紧了。

sentences.en: We were so closely packed in the elevator I could hardly move.
sentences.cn: 电梯里人挨着人，我几乎动弹不得。

sentences.en: We work closely with the careers officers in schools.
sentences.cn: 我们与学校的就业顾问密切合作。

sentences.en: Wherever they went they were closely followed by security men.
sentences.cn: 不管上哪儿，保安人员都紧跟在他们身后。

sentences.en: Working with Ford closely, I fell in love with the cinema.
sentences.cn: 与福特的密切合作开始令我爱上了电影。
